## Question to Answer
What do we need to learn?

## Why this matters
What decision will this unblock?

## Timebox
How long will you spend? (ex: 2 hours)

## Output Required
Pick at least one:
- [ ] Recommendation + reasoning
- [ ] Prototype / proof of concept
- [ ] List of options + tradeoffs
- [ ] Next-step tickets created

## Notes / Links
Anything you find.
